scripts.cy:open: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=qa allure=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx cypress open
scripts.test:qa-sr: cmd /C "cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=qa allure=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx cypress run --env TAGS="not @skip" || exit 0" & npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:qa: cmd /C "cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=qa allure=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx cypress run --env TAGS="not @skip" || exit 0" & npm run allure:generate & npm run allure:open
scripts.test:devel: cmd /C "cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=devel allure=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx cypress run --env TAGS="not @skip" || exit 0" & npm run allure:generate & npm run allure:open
scripts.test:regresion: cmd /C "cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=regresion allure=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx cypress run --env TAGS="not @skip"|| exit 0" & npm run allure:generate & npm run allure:open
scripts.repair:cy: npx cypress cache clear && npx cypress install
